pr_title: [BEAM-9430] Fix coder sent to Dataflow service for non-portable pipelines due to WatermarkEstimators migration change

timeline.message: [BEAM-9430] Fix coder sent to Dataflow service for non-portable pipelines due to WatermarkEstimators migration change

timeline.bodyText: Just curious what if someone has SDF without provide WatermarkEstimator?
timeline.author: boyuanzz

replies.bodyText:
The default watermark estimator state is void and always returns the min timestamp. See: beam/sdks/java/core/src/main/java/org/apache/beam/sdk/transforms/DoFn.java Line 665 in 7310ec2 *
  • It may define a {@link GetInitialWatermarkEstimatorState} method. If none is
replies.author: lukecwik
